column5: Same in Wellington, just exactly as advertised!  Actually, I have practically been able to set my watch by the weatherman this winter.  The accuracy has been astounding.  I can't believe this guy wants to whine cause he didn't get hammered.
Guess everyone missed my point. They advertise it like it's the end of days and it just isn't. Hype. All filler and hype.
There at the point now, where they refer to 5cm as a.......... MAJOR SNOWSTORM ON THE WAY !!! Oh how times have changed...

Our school buses were cancelled on wed here. The roads were bone dry and sunny skies that morning. Then it spit rain a little later that morning.  They hype the hell out of it. Drives me nuts too Moxie, I hear ya man!  S

And if they underestimated and the poop hit the fan then what??  Not sure what you're complaining for here.  There was a chance of freezing rain, they issued their warning, it didn't happen.  Seems like they did their job just fine, but maybe that's just me.
Please give me any kind of wet weather. I;ll take it. Tired of January weather in late March..

The theory here has been the weather channel and other weather networks have cranked up the hype to get you to watch furthering the ratings and thusly getting them P A I D ! Granted, the weather has been extraordinary, but not to the levels and frequency it's been hyped My 2 cents..............

I always get a chuckle outta the TV news stations..specially Toronto...when they do their weather reports from the salt yards every time there's some snow coming to town.  Seems everything over 1" of snow is gonna be a disaster and shut the province down.
Gotta stop getting weather reporters from Washington DC..2 inches shuts down the Government

Gotta stop getting weather reporters from Washington DC..2 inches shuts down the Government Wish we had the equipment we needed to make that statement false. The only good news is no matter how much we get it seems to be able to melt off within a week. Vary rarely do we have long spells of white stuff on the ground.   Art.

I received this from the meteorologists association of Canada early this morning after the complete devastation the freezing rain wrought over our province last night.   WE, THE WEATHER MEN AND WOMEN OF CANADA ARE ISSUING A SPECIAL STATEMENT!!! WE ARE, IN CONJUNCTION WITH ENVIRONMENT CANADA,  COMPLETE IDIOTS. WE REPEAT!!!! COMPLETE IDIOTS!!!! PLEASE STAY TUNED FOR FURTHER DETAILS!!!!!!! Thank you.  Thank goodness they're watching out for us.
Only job in the world where you can be wrong 85% of the time and people still believe you!

Only job in the world where you can be wrong 85% of the time and people still believe you! Amazing isn't it Cliff?  I especially love the "Blood Red" background those wearher statements are posted on. Ooooooooooooo.....Soooooo scaaarrrryyyyy!!!!!!

Best weather forcast available!  Instructions for Newfie weather rock put Newfie weather rock outside  If the rock is wet, it's raining. If the rock is swinging, the wind is blowing. If the rock casts a shadow, the sun is shining. If the rock does not cast a shadow and is not wet, the sky is cloudy. If the rock is not visible, it is foggy. If the rock is white, it is snowing. If the rock is coated with ice, there is a frost. If the ice is thick, it's a heavy frost. If the rock is bouncing, there is an earthquake. If the rock is under water, there is a flood. If the rock is warm, it is sunny. If the rock is missing, there was a tornado. If the rock is wet and swinging violently, there is a hurricane.   Always 100% right!  S.
I was bracing for freezing rain and 5-10cm of snow.  Woke up to this....
I could tell there was no snow/freezing rain because my allergies are still going crazy.

I was bracing for freezing rain and 5-10cm of snow.  Woke up to this....   That looks absolutely horrible!! Did you stock up on supplies when you first heard it was on its way? Call if you need anything. I'll pull the chopper out of the hanger and bring you what you need. Damn thats just aweful.
We got our 10 cm in Alliston .

Best weather forcast available!  Instructions for Newfie weather rock put Newfie weather rock outside  If the rock is wet, it's raining. If the rock is swinging, the wind is blowing. If the rock casts a shadow, the sun is shining. If the rock does not cast a shadow and is not wet, the sky is cloudy. If the rock is not visible, it is foggy. If the rock is white, it is snowing. If the rock is coated with ice, there is a frost. If the ice is thick, it's a heavy frost. If the rock is bouncing, there is an earthquake. If the rock is under water, there is a flood. If the rock is warm, it is sunny. If the rock is missing, there was a tornado. If the rock is wet and swinging violently, there is a hurricane.   Always 100% right!  S. How do you tell the difference between a tornado and fog though? LOL

They were bang on for my area last night, both with the amount of snow and the time it would start and stop. They also said we'd get some sun this afternoon and that's exactly what we have right now.  Course it's not very often that happens
Can't believe the whine that you didn't get as forecast... come shovel my 20+ cm of wet mashed potatoes!  Here's a road shot outside my gate this morning..

They were bang on for my area last night, both with the amount of snow and the time it would start and stop. They also said we'd get some sun this afternoon and that's exactly what we have right now.  Course it's not very often that happens Hey Lew, our cottage is west of Buckhorn.  Still have a foot on the roof.  How much snow did you get last night?
We definitely got more than enough snow last night but that is the norm around here. Nothing special about that.
damned if you do damned if you dont i suppose  we got exactly what was forecast here in dufferin county
How do you tell the difference between a tornado and fog though? LOL in fog, you can't see where you think the rock is tornado, you can see where the rock was yesterday. but it's not there now

Hey Lew, our cottage is west of Buckhorn.  Still have a foot on the roof.  How much snow did you get last night?  We only got 5" over here but it's about 4 degrees right now so it's really heavy, but the good thing is it's melting too. I've got a gravel driveway and cleared it a couple hours ago and most of it is bare now.  Big Cliff is over on Sturgeon and he said they got 6-8" so you should be somewhere in between.

Got out and cleared mine before it got too warm so it was still nice and light. Then the wind came up and drifted a lot of it back in. It has warmed up enough now that it isn't drifting any more and things are starting to melt again. I sure hope this is the last of it though!

in fog, you can't see where you think the rock is tornado, you can see where the rock was yesterday. but it's not there now   In a Tornado, there is a good chance the rock will be through your window.
-1 and snowing since midnight...bang on forecast here
you just wait a minute, and it will change LOL  S.

Got out and cleared mine before it got too warm so it was still nice and light. Then the wind came up and drifted a lot of it back in. It has warmed up enough now that it isn't drifting any more and things are starting to melt again. I sure hope this is the last of it though!  Thanks Guys.  I'm hoping for a slow melt.

I'm hoping for a slow melt  Sposed to be cool for the next few days around here but then climbing to about +6 by next weekend and staying like that for awhile, so that should get some melting happening.  Hope it doesn't cause any damage to your place.
Minus temps all next week over night, and warmer day time. Lets hope it,s a slow melt for those that can get hit heavy with flooding.  Sure glad I live on top of the hill.
I got almost a foot of Heavy snow in Lefroy

Only job in the world where you can be wrong 85% of the time and people still believe you!  but the only job where you get second guessed by a groundhog---and some people prefer the groundhog's opinion!!
